argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hoaddsubass.1 | |- R : ~H --> ~H |
| 2 |  | hoaddsubass.2 | |- S : ~H --> ~H |
| 3 |  | hoaddsubass.3 | |- T : ~H --> ~H |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_hoaddcomi | |- ( R +op S ) = ( S +op R ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( R +op S ) -op T ) = ( ( S +op R ) -op T ) |
| 6 | 2, 1, 3 | #P_hoaddsubassi | |- ( ( S +op R ) -op T ) = ( S +op ( R -op T ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 3 | #P_hosubcli | |- ( R -op T ) : ~H --> ~H |
| 8 | 2, 7 | #P_hoaddcomi | |- ( S +op ( R -op T ) ) = ( ( R -op T ) +op S ) |
| 9 | 5, 6, 8 | #P_3eqtri | |- ( ( R +op S ) -op T ) = ( ( R -op T ) +op S ) |
